title: New: Jamie Isaac – Can See
content:
After posting a new song from Jamie Isaac only last night, it’s with great pleasure that I bring you another cut from the teenage producer.

Can See is a piano driven ballad, relying heavily on the vocal capabilities of Isaac and his lyrical prowess. Thematically the track is mournful and melancholic, filled with longing and remorse, and sure to pull on numerous heartstrings. Check out Can See below.


Water draining through these open clouds. See, my tears they run around

And I can’t see the way, no i can’t see your face.
Shifting along the edge.

Shedding skin whilst sunlight beats on us. Though my tears are filled with lust.

And i can See the way, yes i can see your face.
Drifting along the edge.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
